t: Mary Meyer wholesale products
s: Mary Meyer was a young wife and mother who began sewing animal pin cushions that later became stuffed animal toys. Inventive, driven, and compassionate, Mary built a company that continues to bring joy to children and families worldwide with care, quality, and love.

t: Mary Meyer’s Mission – Mary Meyer Stuffed Toys
s: Mary “Gram” Meyer started her beloved toy company in 1933. Over 80 years later, her children and grandchildren are keeping the legacy alive with over 400 products in the Mary Meyer line. For over 80 years Mary Meyer has been making quality stuffed toys with the extra touches that show we care.
